Text:
thank you, i've been looking for this forever.
it sucks that you cant find the morrowind version of this on bethesda's website.

Thank you very much for share this tool. I just got Morrowind right now and i would like to create god spells like i did in Oblivion, but i was worried because i didn't found the tool on the bethesda web. Thanks again for share it with us, i will help seeding too :)

Peace and love!

For those whom it may concern, if the author's suggestion of .BSA unpackers doesn't work to extract files from the expansions of Morrowind, I suggest the "BSA browser" from the following site:

http://planetelderscrolls.gamespy.com/View.php?view=Utilities.Detail&id=32#Files
